content.text:
# Draft:Hussar (Empire of Serbia)

A Hussar (Empire of Serbia) was a member of a military class of heavy cavalry, originally developed in the Empire of Serbia under the rule of Stefan Dušan the Great about 1336. The Hussars experienced the highest level of development on ultra and beyond on ultra (as heavy cavalry) under the hungarian-born  Stephan Báthory, since 1573 King of Poland (Kingdom of Poland) and since 1571 also prince (duke) of  Transylvania.
